products.name: Popcorn Veggie
products.description: Delightful Popcorn Veggie made with carrots, mushrooms & potatoes accompanied by green chillies, onions & a layer of mozzarella & cream cheese, upon a sriracha & tomato sauce base.

products.name: Devilled Chicken
products.description: Devilled chicken in spicy sauce with a double layer of mozzarella cheese.

products.name: Cheese Lovers
products.description: Rich tomato sauce with a triple layer of mozzarella cheese.

products.name: Tandoori Chicken
products.description: Tandoori chicken & onions with a double layer of mozzarella cheese.

products.name: Sausage Delight
products.description: Chicken sausages & onions with a double layer of mozzarella cheese.

products.name: Black Chicken
products.description: Flavoursome pieces of black chicken and crunchy onion with a double layer of mozzarella cheese.

products.name: Sri Lankan Spicy Chicken Pizza
products.description: A combination of black chicken, devilled chicken & kotchchi chicken sausage meat, accompanied by nai miris, garlic & onion with a double layer of mozzarella cheese.

products.name: Popcorn Chicken Pizza
products.description: Flavoursome popcorn chicken accompanied with crunchy onion and green chilli with delicious mozzarella and cream cheese, upon a sriracha and tomato sauce base.

products.name: Spicy Veggie with Paneer
products.description: Spicy veggie masala & paneer accompanied with pineapple, topped with a double layer of mozzarella cheese

products.name: Butter Chicken Masala
products.description: The ever famous Butter Masala Chicken together with a layer of cream cheese, fresh onions, coriander, ginger and garlic, blanketed with a layer of mozzarella cheese.

products.name: The Ultimate Chicken Treat
products.description: A combination of BBQ chicken, chicken bacon, chicken sausage & an all new roast chicken, accompanied with the freshest green pepper, mushroom, onion and green chilli, blanketed with delicious mozzarella cheese.

products.name: Hot Butter Cuttlefish
products.description: Hot butter cuttlefish with chili flakes and butter accompanied by spring onion and capsicum with a double layer of mozzarella cheese.
